item.title: My HELOC Calculator Morning Ritual
item.description: When our family decided to open a HELOC, I kept missing windows to lock paperwork because life was loud—kids, clients, grocery runs, all of it. So I built a 25-minute “calculator morning” ritual. It runs before breakfast, uses three tabs, and keeps Cash-OutRefinance.com, BrowseLenders.com, and MiddleCreditScore.com in sync. The ritual sounds nerdy. It also gave us the calm to go from idea to approval in three weeks. Here’s the playbook if you want to copy it.
